===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|ちょう|つがい|yomi=j}}
Compound of {{affix|sort=ちょうつがい|ja|蝶|tr1=chō|t1=butterfly|番|tr2=tsugai|t2=joint}}, from the way that it looks like a butterfly.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=j|ちょうつがい|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ちょうつがい|hhira=てふつがひ}}

# [[hinge]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|ちょう|ばん|yomi=o}}
Alteration of ''chōtsugai'' above, using the [[音読み#Japanese|on'yomi]] of ''ban'' for the {{ja-l|番}} character.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ちょうばん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ちょうばん|hhira=てふばん}}

# [[hinge]]
